name: Pokemaku the malicious legend <prototype>
description:
Pokemaku the second game prototype

Legend/Mythical  Pokemon Rush/  

How to play
  • Z : shot           X or C : use main skill
  • Shift : slow move        Z+Z : shoot pokeball
  • S or D : change next sub skill

shoot pokemon to decrease health. when pokemon has few health, shoot pokeball to last hit.        kill all the pokemon befor you die!
